title: Interactive Portfolio with AI Persona Chatbot
description: A production-ready portfolio built with Next.js and an Express backend, featuring an AI persona chatbot with context-aware responses and chat history.

title: Resume Matcher & Career Assistant
description: An AI-assisted tool that compares a resume with job descriptions, highlights gaps, and suggests improvements with actionable guidance.

title: AI-Powered Chat Application
description: A real-time chat application with AI-powered responses and sentiment analysis.
